<h3 id="X30379">X(30379) = ENDO-HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-WASAT AND 2nd EHRMANN</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; ((b+c)*a^2-2*(b^2-b*c+c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))*(a+b-c)*(a+c-b)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(30379) = X(7)+2*X(3911) = 4*X(142)-X(908) = 2*X(10427)+X(26015)</b>
<p>
The homothetic center of these triangles is X(21639). X(30379) is their endo-homothetic center only when ABC is acute.</p>
<p>X(30379) lies on these lines:
{2,7}, {4,8544}, {8,30318}, {10,30312}, {11,15726}, {36,516}, {56,5880}, {65,25557}, {77,3554}, {222,26723}, {241,1086}, {269,4859}, {277,4350}, {279,24181}, {354,8255}, {377,1467}, {390,3576}, {514,7216}, {515,18450}, {518,6735}, {519,14151}, {528,1319}, {651,3008}, {653,5236}, {673,909}, {946,5265}, {971,1532}, {1001,1470}, {1012,5805}, {1042,24178}, {1125,8543}, {1156,11219}, {1210,6932}, {1266,4552}, {1323,15727}, {1407,24789}, {1420,4190}, {1422,15474}, {1429,1813}, {1441,24199}, {1442,3946}, {1443,17067}, {1458,1738}, {1519,15325}, {1699,30353}, {1737,2801}, {2078,3254}, {2550,3476}, {3011,9364}, {3243,12648}, {3361,12609}, {3488,6916}, {3522,12053}, {3523,5766}, {3586,5732}, {3660,10427}, {3668,17092}, {3817,30311}, {3826,8581}, {3912,20881}, {4292,6912}, {4298,5258}, {4312,6974}, {4321,9623}, {4341,24779}, {4425,30359}, {4648,7190}, {4652,5698}, {4675,5228}, {5220,24914}, {5298,28534}, {5433,15254}, {5445,13407}, {5542,5902}, {5696,10916}, {5704,6260}, {5723,6610}, {5728,6907}, {5735,6966}, {5784,6734}, {6049,21627}, {6067,15587}, {6180,17278}, {6913,18541}, {7176,17050}, {7671,11019}, {7676,15931}, {7988,9814}, {8236,13384}, {9358,24198}, {9710,9850}, {11038,11526}, {12047,30424}, {12709,24564}, {12832,25558}, {14100,15845}, {14953,17197}, {16133,26725}, {17080,24177}, {17095,17305}, {17625,25006}, {21620,30340}, {21622,30367}, {21623,30405}, {21624,30404}, {24389,25722}, {26001,26932}</p>
<p>
X(30379) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 7, 8545), (7, 142, 21617), (142, 6173, 5249)<br>
</p>
